item.title: 有限选择将中国推向与特朗普的贸易 "消耗战
item.description: 美国对中国和任何购买或组装中国商品的国家加紧征收关税，北京感到被逼入绝境，正准备迎接一场经济消耗战。【原文：Beijing, feeling boxed into a corner by the United States' intensifying tariff assault on China and any country that buys or assembles Chinese goods, is bracing for an economic war of attrition.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，马斯克的 DOGE 使用人工智能窥探美国联邦政府工作人员
item.description: 两位知情人士说，特朗普政府官员已告诉一些美国政府雇员，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 DOGE 技术专家团队正在利用人工智能监控至少一个联邦机构的通信，以寻找对唐纳德-特朗普总统及其议程的敌意。【原文：Trump administration officials have told some U.S. government employees that Elon Musk's DOGE team of technologists is using artificial intelligence to surveil at least one federal agency’s communications for hostility to President Donald Trump and his agenda, said two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯称美国关税带来的通胀上升可能推迟货币政策正常化进程
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税后可能出现的通胀走高和全球贸易战可能会推迟欧元区货币政策的正常化。【原文：European Central Bank policymaker Yannis Stournaras said on Tuesday that likely higher inflation and a global trade war following U.S. President Donald Trump's imposition of tariffs could delay normalization of euro zone monetary policy.】

item.title: 反垄断负责人称，欧盟将在未来几周内对苹果和 Meta 做出决定
item.description: 欧盟反垄断局长特雷莎-里贝拉（Teresa Ribera）周二告诉欧洲议会立法者，欧盟将在未来几周内就苹果和 Meta 公司是否违反了旨在遏制其市场力量的具有里程碑意义的技术规则做出决定。【原文：An EU decision on whether Apple and Meta have breached landmark tech rules aimed at curbing their market power will be issued in the coming weeks, antitrust chief Teresa Ribera told European Parliament lawmakers on Tuesday.】

item.title: 医疗保险支付率 "最佳情况 "下，医疗保险股上涨
item.description: 周二，美国医疗保险公司股价跳涨，原因是政府对 2026 年医疗保险优势计划的报销比例上调幅度大于预期，这为医疗成本高企的医疗行业带来了一些缓解。【原文：Shares of U.S. health insurers jumped on Tuesday after a bigger-than-expected increase in the government's reimbursement rates for Medicare Advantage plans in 2026, bringing some relief to a sector burdened with elevated medical costs.】

item.title: 美国小型企业信心下降，经济前景黯淡
item.description: 美国小企业的信心在 3 月份连续第三个月下降，侵蚀了唐纳德-特朗普总统在 11 月大选获胜后取得的大部分涨幅，因为尽管人们早期对预期的减税和放松管制可能带来的商业推动持乐观态度，但对政府贸易政策的担忧却在增加。【原文：U.S. small-business confidence dropped for a third straight month in March, eroding most of the gains that followed President Donald Trump's election victory in November, amid rising concerns over the administration's trade policy despite early optimism about a potential business boost from expected tax cuts and deregulation.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）"堆积如山的美元 "是解除阿根廷外汇管制的关键
item.description: 阿根廷即将与国际货币基金组织达成的 200 亿美元协议将为自由主义总统哈维尔-米莱伊带来他想要的工具，以解除阻碍投资的资本管制，重返全球市场："堆积如山的美元"。【原文：Argentina's pending $20 billion deal with the International Monetary Fund will bring libertarian President Javier Milei the tool he wants to unlock investment-blocking capital controls and a return to the global market: a "mountain of dollars".】

item.title: 在儿童网络安全监管的推动下，Meta 将 "青少年账户 "扩展至 Facebook 和 Messenger
item.description: Meta Platforms 周二将在 Facebook 和 Messenger 上推出 "青少年账户 "功能，因为该公司在保护青少年用户免受网络伤害方面做得不够，因而受到了持续的批评。【原文：Meta Platforms is rolling out its "Teen Accounts" feature to Facebook and Messenger on Tuesday, as it faces sustained criticism about not doing enough to protect young users from online harms.】

item.title: 巴西、埃及和新加坡是关税冲击下的潜在赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布全面征收关税的消息震惊了美国的多个贸易伙伴和全球市场，几天之后，少数几个国家正在成为潜在的赢家，尽管关税引发的经济衰退风险将限制其上升空间。【原文：Days after U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement of sweeping tariffs shocked multiple U.S. trading partners and global markets, a handful of countries are emerging as potential winners although the risk of a tariff-induced recession will limit the upside.】

item.title: 美国民主党参议员质疑谷歌和微软的人工智能交易
item.description: 两位美国民主党参议员要求微软和谷歌提供信息，说明它们与人工智能公司的云计算合作关系，并对这些安排可能扼杀尖端产业的竞争表示担忧。【原文：Two Democratic U.S. senators demanded information from Microsoft and Google about their cloud computing partnerships with artificial intelligence companies, expressing concern the arrangements could stifle competition in the cutting-edge industry.】

item.title: 一些美国消费者在特朗普征收新关税前囤积商品
item.description: 53 岁的托马斯-詹宁斯（Thomas Jennings）推着购物车走在沃尔玛超市的过道上，他买了很多果汁、调味品和他能想到的任何东西。【原文：Pushing a shopping cart down the aisle of a Walmart Supercenter, Thomas Jennings, 53, loaded up on juices, condiments and whatever he could think of.】

item.title: 突然抛售震撼美国债券市场
item.description: 美国国债周二继续大幅回落，投资者不得不抛售债券以弥补其他资产的损失，并争相解除对美国大幅降息的预期，这是金融市场可能面临压力的最新令人不安的迹象。【原文：U.S. Treasuries extended a sharp retreat on Tuesday as investors were having to sell bonds to cover losses in other assets and scrambled to unwind expectations for deep U.S. rate cuts, in the latest unsettling sign of possible stress in financial markets.】

item.title: 油价暴跌如何使沙特阿拉伯的经济议程复杂化
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的财富与石油收入密不可分，在原油价格暴跌之后，沙特阿拉伯面临着越来越大的举债或削减开支的压力，这使得为雄心勃勃的经济多元化议程提供资金的计划变得更加复杂。【原文：Saudi Arabia, with its wealth linked inextricably to oil revenue, faces mounting pressure to raise debt or cut spending after a plunge in crude prices, complicating plans to fund an ambitious agenda to diversify its economy.】

item.title: 印尼在谈判前宣布对美贸易减让措施
item.description: 在与华盛顿就唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面关税进行贸易谈判之前，印度尼西亚周二宣布了一系列针对美国进口的优惠措施，包括降低电子产品和钢铁的税率。【原文：Indonesia announced a spate of concessions for U.S. imports on Tuesday, including reducing taxes on electronic goods and steel, ahead of trade negotiations with Washington over President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 关税谈判有望重启，期价重挫后上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货自上周以来遭受了数万亿美元的损失，周二股指走高，预示着美国股指将反弹，因为投资者正翘首以待美国就一些激进关税问题展开谈判的任何迹象。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Tuesday after taking in trillions of dollars in losses since last week, signaling a rebound as investors keenly await any sign of the U.S. opening up for negotiations over some of the aggressive tariffs.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩呼吁中国确保采取负责任的关税应对措施
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周二呼吁中国确保通过谈判解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收全面进口关税所造成的问题。【原文：EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen called on Tuesday for China to ensure a negotiated solution to problems caused by the sweeping import tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国国有资产监管机构支持企业回购股票
item.description: 中国国有资产监管机构周二表示，将支持中央企业增持和回购股票，以减轻全球贸易战升级对中国股市的影响。【原文：China's regulatory body for state assets said on Tuesday it would support central government-owned companies to increase their stock holdings and share buybacks to mitigate the impact of an escalating global trade war on the country's stock market.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与亚马逊签署临时协议，为航空公司提供连接服务
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周二表示，它已与亚马逊公司（Amazon）签署了一项临时协议，通过这家科技巨头计划中的 "柯伊伯"（Kuiper）卫星星座为航空公司提供连接服务。 空中客车公司在汉堡举行的一次大型客舱内饰展览会上宣布了这项加强 "高带宽连接增强"（High Bandwidth Connectivity Plus）计划的计划。【原文：Airbus said on Tuesday it had signed a provisional deal with Amazon to provide connectivity to airlines via the tech giant’s planned Kuiper constellation of satellites. The plan to enhance Airbus’ High Bandwidth Connectivity Plus programme was announced at a major cabin interiors exhibition in Hamburg.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普下令利用煤炭为数据中心供电
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引一位白宫高级官员的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在寻求扩大国内煤炭的开采和使用，以推动数据中心的蓬勃发展。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is seeking to expand the mining and use of coal inside the country in a bid to power the boom in data centers, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a senior White House official.】

item.title: 德国大陆集团称将分离橡胶部门，并可能将其出售
item.description: 德国大陆集团（Continental AG）周二表示，将把旗下的康迪泰克（ContiTech）橡胶和塑料分部转变为一个独立实体，并有可能将其出售。【原文：Germany's Continental AG on Tuesday said it would turn its ContiTech rubber and plastics division into an independent entity that would likely be put up for sale.】

item.title: 北美需求疲软，戴姆勒卡车第一季度销量下降 8
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司周二报告称，由于北美和梅赛德斯-奔驰卡车部门的需求下降，第一季度销量下降了 8%。【原文：Daimler Truck on Tuesday reported an 8% drop in first-quarter sales citing declining demand in North America and Mercedes-Benz Trucks units.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击澳大利亚牛肉，但澳大利亚牛肉业看起来是关税赢家
item.description: 上周，在唐纳德-特朗普宣布对来自众多国家的进口商品征收关税的当天，这位美国总统特别提到了澳大利亚牛肉。【原文：On the day Donald Trump announced tariffs on imports from a dizzying number of countries last week, the U.S. president gave a special mention to Australian beef.】

item.title: 中美贸易战升级，中国农业股大涨
item.description: 周二，中国农业股大幅上涨，原因是投资者押注关税将限制美国农产品进口并提振国内生产商，从而抵御了中美贸易战升级引发的大盘暴跌。【原文：Chinese agricultural stocks rose sharply on Tuesday as investors bet tariffs would limit U.S. agricultural imports and boost domestic producers, defying a broader market crash sparked by the escalating U.S.-China trade war.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所首席执行官：关税冲击后美国开始像一个新兴市场
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext）首席执行官斯特凡-布杰纳（Stephane Boujnah）周二表示，美国开始更像一个新兴市场，而不是发达国家，因为在美国征收全面关税后，金融市场依然动荡不安。【原文：The United States is starting to resemble an emerging market more than a developed country, Euronext's CEO Stephane Boujnah said on Tuesday as financial markets remained volatile after the imposition of sweeping U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 中国与民营企业会面，听取应对美国关税的建议
item.description: 中国国家规划院周二表示，它与包括天合光能在内的国内私营企业、打车公司滴滴和Goertek举行了一次会议，以听取关于如何应对美国额外关税的建议。【原文：China's state planner said on Tuesday it held a meeting with private domestic companies, including Trina Solar , ride-hailing company Didi and Goertek , to hear suggestions about how to deal with additional U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 数据显示，英国投资者在特朗普关税动荡前大举买入美股
item.description: 基金网络 Calastone 周二称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普上周宣布一系列贸易关税措施之前的几周，英国投资者纷纷涌入美国股市，导致股市暴跌。【原文：British investors piled into U.S. stocks in the weeks leading up to President Donald Trump's announcement of a barrage of trade tariffs last week that sent stocks tanking, funds network Calastone said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 保时捷第一季度交付量下降 8%，原因是中国和欧洲市场需求疲软
item.description: 德国跑车制造商保时捷周二表示，受中国和欧洲需求下降的影响，第一季度全球汽车交付量减少了 8%。【原文：German sports car maker Porsche delivered 8% fewer vehicles globally in the first quarter, it said on Tuesday, hit by declining demand in China and Europe.】

item.title: 就像蒙着眼睛扔飞镖"；关税给中国出口商造成损失
item.description: 从餐具到地板，中国商品制造商纷纷发出利润预警，争相规划新的海外工厂或加快离岸项目，同时与客户讨价还价，以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税。【原文：Chinese manufacturers of goods from tableware to flooring are flagging profit warnings, scrambling to plan new overseas plants or accelerate offshore projects, while haggling with customers over prices as they reel from President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称全球对冲基金蒙受损失，净杠杆率随市场暴跌而下降
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布全面征收关税后，上周市场暴跌，摩根士丹利在全球范围内追踪的对冲基金损失不断增加，年初至今的业绩表现转为下跌3%，并导致其净杠杆率下降。【原文：Hedge funds tracked by Morgan Stanley globally posted growing losses as markets tumbled last week after U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement of sweeping tariffs, turning year-to-date performance to a 3% decline and driving down their net leverage.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，马斯克直接呼吁特朗普撤销新关税
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周一援引两位知情人士的话报道，科技亿万富翁、特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）上周末直接呼吁美国总统唐纳德-特朗普撤销关税，但未获成功。【原文：Tech-billionaire and Tesla CEO Elon Musk made direct yet unsuccessful appeals to U.S. President Donald Trump to reverse tariffs over the past weekend, Washington Post reported on Monday citing two people familiar with the matter.】
